desc: *** A Must See! *** This updated townhouse is centrally located to schools, shopping, medical & restaurants with easy access to 95. A long list of updates include: A new roof 2022, Updated Kitchen with new appliances and cabinets, New carpet upstairs, New fresh interior paint, all New Window Treatments, New European Wood Laminate Flooring in the living areas. A fenced courtyard for privacy for your outdoor activities and a great view of the rocket launches. A community pool to have some fun also.

Recently Renovated 2 story 2 bed 11/2 bath townhouse with privacy fenced back yard area. Dining area, galley kitchen and living room along with 1/2 bath located on the first level. Kitchen has stainless appliances and granite countertops. Ceramic tile throughout downstairs, carpet throughout upstairs. 2nd level includes Master bedroom with his/hers closets, inside laundry hook up, guest bedroom and guest bath with Granite top. Community pool, lawn maintenance and basic cable included in the very low monthly assoc. fee. Roof 3 yrs, HVAC 1 year. Great location for easy commute to Kennedy Space Center, Orlando, and beaches. Just minutes to major highways.

Impeccable 2nd floor updated condo located on a cul de sac in a desirable location in Titusville. The condo unit offers contemporary ease & convenience that builds a lifestyle of relaxation set within a safe & tranquil neighborhood. The home has 2 spacious bedrooms,2 baths with a walk in closet in the master. Enjoy preparing your food in the custom upgraded granite kitchen with stainless steel appliances - enough space for a small table or office with window & balcony. A dining room & living room open up with views of green space. Sit by the fireplace during the colder days. Master bathroom upgraded with new cabinets & beautiful granite. A one car garage is included giving plenty of space and additional storage. Watch rocket launches from your front door! Newer Roof. Updates since 2018 - new garage door opener, new outdoor entrance lights, new carpeting in master & hallways, fresh interior paint, New light fixtures, blinds, fans, toilets and bathroom hardware. Close to everything!
